malawi vs venezuela, adults only

Source: R/data.R
malawi.Rd

This is a subset of the "malawi vs venezuela, adults only" task from the Microbiome Learning Repo. The task is to predict whether the individuals live in Malawi or Venezuela based on the OTU count table. OTUs that occur in less than 10% of the samples are excluded. Only Bacteria are included. The taxonomic table for the OTUs was obtained by the greengenes reference database. The data was originally published in Yatsunenko, T., Rey, F. E., Manary, M. J., Trehan, I., Dominguez-Bello, M. G., Contreras, M., ... & Gordon, J. I. (2012). Human gut microbiome viewed across age and geography. nature, 486(7402), 222-227..

malawi

Format

A phyloseq object:

otu_table

OTU count table with 54 rows corresponding to subjects and 5008 columns corresponding to OTUs

tax_table

Taxonomic table with the taxonomic assignment on different levels for the OTUs. The names of the OTUs are saved in the rownames. The 5008 rows correspond to the different OTUS and the 7 columns to the different levels of the taxonomic tree (Kingdom, Phylum, Class, Order, Family, Genus, Species)

sam_data

Meta data about the different observations. Contains the labels Vars and additional covariates sex (binary) and age (numeric)

Contents

Developed by Jacob Bien, Christian Mueller, Xiaohan Yan.
